extendedInfo.description: This Live Wallpaper displays photos downloaded from popular photography sites: 500px, Flickr, Instagram and Panoramio. You can also use your local albums.It can also be used as a Daydream - for Android 4.2+ devices. (***)Photos can be displayed as:â  Multipicture - different photo for each screen (see warning at the end)â  Collage - several photos arranged in a collageâ  Classic - one photo across all screensPhotos can be selected by:â  500px categoriesâ  500px authorâ  User tags (500px)â  Current weather at your location (500px)â  Color (500px)â  Flickr (latest interesting photos)â  Panoramio (around you)â  Instagram (popular or around you)â  Local albumsThere are many customization options for each selection.Choose actions for double-tap, two-finger tap, three-finger tap: â  Change photoâ  Change all photosâ  View photo in full screenâ  Bring up options dialog with more quick functions: change fit mode, share photo, open preferences dialog...MC-Photo is also an application so same options dialog can be started through it's application icon.Add MC-Photo widget to home screen and tap it to quickly change photos.'Static' setting - turn this Live Wallpaper into static wallpaper changer and get maximum possible swiping performance! (Works for collage and classic modes.) Warning: in this mode tap actions don't work.*** For now, daydream uses photos already cached by Live Wallpaper part so it won't have anything to show if you don't use LWP first.Warning:Multipicture mode and wallpaper scrolling depend on your Home application.If scrolling does not work you can check Home app's settings - maybe there is an option to turn it on (ie. Go Launcher Ex has it). It definitely doesn't work on default Home applications of the Galaxy S series (ICS) and the HTC Sense 3.X. because they don't notify right screen position. Same for ASUS Transformer Pad Infinity TF700T.

reviews.title: Settings fail to save
reviews.comment: Settings not being saved right again. Have to double-tap and change settings several times before settings are saved. Also randomly crashes and reverts back to my default wallpaper.
reviews.author: Nicolo Legaspi

reviews.title: With a (google imposed) side of censorship...
reviews.comment: Appreciate the developer\'s responsiveness to my presumption below.  I was curios why you\'ve chosen to add a filter the 500px site itself doesn\'t have?   It really is a nice app.
reviews.author: Roger Sanchez

reviews.title: Choppy on 4.3
reviews.comment: Nexus 4. Stock Update:  homescreen transitions using all launchers are very choppy with low frame rate in recent versions. Maybe due to android 4.3?  Despite this the dev is great at bringing fast updates and the app is second to none. Will update rating once improvements land.
reviews.author: Muhammad Subhani

reviews.title: 3 weeks
reviews.comment: Osam

reviews.title: MC-Photo Live Wallpaper
reviews.comment: I like it! Because it works for me!

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Edit: Yes thanks it works as it should now.

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good overall but display settings crashes when opened. Have to change first the wallpaper so I can access that.
reviews.author: Raphael Fernandez

reviews.title: Sluggish
reviews.comment: It\'s a great unmatched app out there. But it\'s making my screen transition sluggish. Please fix... Other wise my 5 stars are set.
reviews.author: Vishal Ramnani

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: This is a great live wallpaper app for 500px. However, there\'s just one thing that\'s stopping me from using it - wallpaper transitions to different screens doesn\'t have a \'Fade In/Out\' option.  Edit: Absolutely outstanding. You instantly replied and acted to update the app. Fantastic developer. Just edited my rating too. There fade in/out function works perfectly on my S3 and this is now my wallpaper. Wish there were more developers like you. Pleaser continue your excellent work!
reviews.author: Martin Tran

reviews.title: S3
reviews.comment: After setup 2nd it seems the pic doesn\'t change on the set interval time. Not sure why. I set it both for home n lock screen
reviews.author: Dennis Bong

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Super
reviews.author: Rangeela Raja

reviews.comment: It does what I want. I mainly wanted an apparently that pulls images from 500px and automatically update my wallpaper.\tI used the static WP option so that it runs more smoothly on my old atrix 4g. As a result, I am unable to click and update the wallpaper. I have to tap the app and then select uplate. Although it\'s not bad, I still prefer a 1 slot widget that allow me to change the wallpaper in one tap. But overall, I enjoy it very much!
reviews.author: Chris Ye

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Best thing i ever seen thank you very much More than i expect
reviews.author: Asad Attily

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: What happened to \"Autoscroll\" on phones? It disappeared after one of the recent updates on my Nexus 4, I just noticed it is still an option on my Nexus 7, but even after the 3/28 update it is still missing on the phone. Guess I\'ll attempt an uninstall/reinstall.  Duh.. found it, easy to get stuck in a can when one option \"hides\" another.

reviews.title: Memory Hungry Wallpaper!!!
reviews.comment: Please Reduce Its Memory Usage & Remove Its Icon From App Drawer!!!

reviews.title: I guess it\'s okay
reviews.comment: Nothing really special..

reviews.title: MUST HAVE APP
reviews.comment: Works as described. Pulls photos from various sources for wallpaper, and changes at set interval. Simple, but brilliant.  Recommend to use it in static wallpaper mode.  If you find bugs, please email the dev!! He WILL respond, and he DOES. Two thumbs up for developer responding to queries!

reviews.title: Awesome app , one of the best apps of the store
reviews.comment: Works perfectly on my LG Optimus.

reviews.title: Excellent. Quick response.
reviews.comment: Thanks for the bug fix. Its perfect now.
reviews.author: A Google User
